data.actual_result: Your message will be marked as unread
data.expected_result: Your message shouldn't be marked as unread
data.short_description: Sending an emote from another server in a server will make it as unread (must not have nitro)
data.steps_to_repro: - Try sending an emote to force clyde to send a message - Once you get clyde's message, restart your client by clicking the home button and swiping it up - Open app once again
